articles.title: Bill Ackman sells 10% stake in Pershing Square for $1.05bn - Financial Times
articles.description: Sale to a group of family offices and investment firms comes as the hedge fund plots IPO
articles.content:
Bill Ackman has sold a 10 per cent stake in Pershing Square in a deal that values the hedge fund at just over $10bn ahead of a possible initial public offering next year.
